panels.content:
Isilon statistics that are node specfic and show whats going on with the network and disks for the Isilon nodes.

Click on each row title to expand on demand to look at various metrics.

panels.description: Average bytes read per second for all disks
panels.title: Disk Reads

panels.description: Average slow accesses per second for all disks
panels.title: Disks Slow

panels.description: Average access latency for all disks
panels.title: Disk Latency

panels.description: Average disk busy percent, per node
panels.title: Disk Busy

panels.description: Avg iosched queue length for all disks
panels.title: Disk I/O Scheduler Queue Length

panels.description: Avg iosched latency for all disks
panels.title: Disk I/O Scheduler Latency

panels.description: Incoming errors per second for a node's external interfaces
panels.title: External Network Errors

panels.description: Errors per second for a node's internal interfaces
panels.title: Internal Network Errors

list.label: Nodes
list.name: node
list.query: show tag values with key = "node" where "cluster" =~ /^$cluster/
